description.narrative:
1) Increased access to water, sanitation facilities and improved hygiene practices. 3 mini water supply systems constructed to improve access to water; this activity will be conduct by a company selected through tender process. 3 training sessions organized in hygiene promotion, food safety, quality of drinking water and protection of water from pollution. This trainings will be conducted in close coordination with local Government hygiene and sanitation district.
2) Increased food security. 3 gardens, 1 hectare each, for women associations setup in partnership with Agricultural district of Kollo. 1 training session on garden products conservation organized in close coordination with Agricultural district of Kollo.
3) Increased understanding of nutritional practices for children’s wellbeing. Using specific family practices (PFE), the Kollo community would be sensitized and educated on child malnutrition in a close partnership with the health district of Kollo. 1 training in nutrition education organized by the health district of Kollo through a MoU. Nutritional and culinary demonstration sessions done by the health district of Kollo through a MoU.
To improve the quality of life of people living in 3 villages in Kollo District through improving community knowledge on child malnutrition, access to safe drinking water and garden products.
